verbose_text: We found that AAV9-STAS significantly reduced the percentage of vulnerable L5 MMC motor neurons expressing phosphorylated p53 S18 (p-p53 S18) in SMA (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), consistent with Stasimon overexpression preventing SMA motor neuron death through modulation of p53 phosphorylation.
evidence: AAV9-STAS significantly reduced the percentage of vulnerable L5 MMC
